A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved this movie.  I want to see it 5 more times.\n\nI have been a Star Wars fan since I saw Return of the Jedi in the theater\, the first movie I remember seeing in the theater.  This was a beautiful\, unpredictable story full of interesting twists and misdirections.  I thought all the notes they hit were awesome\, and I can't wait to see it again.
